Package main.Java

Class CollisionChecker

java.lang.Object
main.Java.CollisionChecker
public class CollisionChecker extends Object
CollisionChecker Manage all the collisions for all the entities, objects and tiles

  • Method Details

    • checkTile

      public void checkTile​(Entity entity)
      check collisions with world Check the collisions with the world for the entity passed as parameter. If the entity is an enemy or the player he collides with the wall. If it is a projectile it will be destroyed Contains the magic souts!!!
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to check

    • checkEntity

      public int checkEntity​(Entity entity, ArrayList<Entity> target)
      check the passed entity collisions with other enemies check the passed entity collisions with all the other entities in the current room
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to check
      target - all the enemies in the current room
      Returns:
      the position of the current colliding entity in the ArrayList

    • checkObject

      public int checkObject​(Entity player)
      check the passed Entity collisions with the objects check the Player collisions with all the objects If the object has tile collision, the Player collides with the object and returns the position of the object in the ArrayList If it hasn't, it just returns the position of the object in the ArrayList
      Parameters:
      player - check the player
      Returns:
      the position of the object in the ArrayList

    • checkPlayer

      public boolean checkPlayer​(Entity entity)
      check the passed Entity collisions with the player check the passed Entity collisions with the player. If it collide it activates the collisions
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to check
      Returns:
      if the entity is colliding with the player returns true else false

    • checkBorder

      public void checkBorder​(Entity entity)
      Check the collisions with the "doors" Check the collisions with the "exits" from the room. If the entity that is colliding is a player it changes the room to the next one in that direction else if the entity is a projectile it destroys it
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to check
